info.name: Gravity's Dark Anilist
info.description:
Please use the Github for issue reporting.
Github: https://github.com/Z3ROGRAV1TYx/Anilist-Dark-Theme

It is highly reccomended to use this paired with @Hoh's userscript: https://github.com/hohMiyazawa/Automail

____________

Still new to css, so stuff may be broke or messed up. Using this as a learning experience. 

For a more stable release, you may want to take a look at SlickBoy (@Erwin)'s theme: https://userstyles.org/styles/162817/anilist-hossori which this was forked from.
